ygData.subject: Re: Petition and general opinions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... We don t have the HP that the grunts do (not by a long shot).  We don t have the innate combat abilities they do.  Although we *can* act like tanks, and we
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:56 PM 6/9/99 -0400, you wrote:
>I'm interested in why you think "The Bard was never intended to be a
>grunt-class." Why do you say that? We can use all the "grunt" weapons except
>the big two handers. We have strength as a major attribute, just like the
>grunts. How are we not a "big burly type"?

We don't have the HP that the grunts do (not by a long shot). We don't
have the innate combat abilities they do. Although we *can* act like
tanks, and we *can* solo, that is not our strength. If you can get it to
work for you, good on ye, mate.

Talies the Wanderer
